      • defaultRecipeGetRemainingItems

        public static net.minecraft.util.NonNullList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> defaultRecipeGetRemainingItems​(net.minecraft.inventory.InventoryCrafting inv)
        Default implementation of IRecipe.func_179532_b {getRemainingItems} because this is just copy pasted over a lot of recipes.
        参数:
        inv - Crafting inventory
        返回:
        Crafting inventory contents after the recipe.

        use ForgeEventFactory.onProjectileImpact(EntityThrowable, RayTraceResult)
